annotations.description: Inspired by the Little Italy, this Mexican take on the drink is fantastic! This drink was created by San Diego Bartenders Ron Umphenour and Matt Sullens from...
annotations.title: Oaxacan Roja A Little Italy Variation By Way Of Mexico

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Mezcal
.5oz (15ml) Cynar (or Cynar 70)
.5oz (15ml) Maraschino Liqueur
2 Dashes Orange Bitters
Luxardo Cherry Garnish

Stir over ice and strain into nick and nora. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F4dqgzFFTS0
title: Oaxacan Roja
